data.text: @EU_Commission Decadent Europe will lose UK, CAT and probably France in about 10 years. Spain will collapse without CAT. Good luck, you'll need it.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU FUCK EU MOTHERFUCKERS!,you are going to blow up when Spain losses Catalonia but keeps its 1 billion unpayable debt
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU surely the EU has to do something about the behaviour of the Spanish Govt on its citizens
@EU_Commission @cbtobon This may give you more light into what happened yesterday.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU #shame
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Shame on you EU. 'Not legal' does not justify the violent actions against totally pacific people. EU reaction is disgusting.
@EU_Commission shame on you!!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU where voting is illegal?
@EU_Commission is committing fraud today! Art. 7 states that Spain should be suspended but preferred 2accept political violence. #ShameOnYou
@EU_Commission I’m more worried about safety in Catalonia after you didnt want to temporarily cancel Spanish membership for using violence against citizens
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Shame on you (again). EU is begining its end of life. Refugees, Brexit, Ukrania, ISIS, Nazism... and now you abandoned 3 mill EU citizens.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy Unfuckenbelievable it’s 2017 not 1936. Look what happened then when Europe stood back and watched.
@EU_Commission internal issue? wasn’t aware that you did’t care about civil rights #handsoffcatalonia
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU If you allow the violence and manipulation, you're blessing the death of democracy and Europe. It would be a same @EU_Commission
@EU_Commission Sou portugues por naturalização e desejo saber de meus direitos quanto a comissão européia pois não tenho participado.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU that is a shitty position EU commission. it will certainly be quoted on future history books. Is it "legal" to treat/beat people like that?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Maybe illegal under Spanish Constitution but what do you have to say about heavy handed police repression in #Catalonia ??
@EU_Commission You just lost milions of EU citizens today. Don't wanna be part of EU
@EU_Commission OLD, SLOW, OXIDATED AND USELESS IS WHAT IS THIS EU ZONE YOU CREATED! Incapable to make fast desicions and bring solutions to the EU citizens
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU if Catalan Parliment declarates his indepence, you will leave alone a country without army. SOS EU
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy Not a word abt @marianorajoy @guardiacivil inflicting abhorrent violence on Catalan voters. You've lost the support of a nation. #ShameEU
@EU_Commission IT WILL BE A BEFORE AND AFTER 1ST OCTOBER IN CATALUNYA, SPAIN AND EUROPE!! GET READY TO DISSOLVE YOUR UNFARE EUROZONE OF DISASTER!!!!
@EU_Commission What do you pretend to do about the violation of the fundamental rights of the Catalans? We are european citizens!
@EU_Commission Mr Schinas, perhaps your statements are just a little bit compromised by your wife's interesting family background? Know also Mr Rato?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU If catalans have to get away from EU because decided not to be part of Spain, we take it, but EU is responsable of spanish dictatorship
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Shameful. EU is remaining blind to all violence and repression. #maderosgohome

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU More than 800 people injured. Do not you know???
Shame, in catalan VERGONYA!.#ShameOnEU #ShameOnSpain
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy In this tweet, EU is supporting the violence against people just for wanted to VOTE. It's very harmful for the Democracy. Is the way of EU?

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy 11y. asking: 
2006-Estatut? No
Financial Agreement? No
Language Protection? No
Refugees inclusion? No
Negotiation? No
Referendum? No
...Now?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Doncs... Aneu a pastar fang! No us importa la gent... De fet, ja ho sabíem. Vosaltres sou la #Vergonya d'Europa.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Beim Kosovo wart ihr da großzügier, beim Zerfall von Jugoslawien auch, da konntet ihr die Anerkennung der Staaten kaum erwarten! #Heuchelei
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Ask Catalan people today, you'll be surprised how many Signe for that! They are saying GAME OVER #ShameEU
@EU_Commission @andimabxl @JunckerEU If no #peacefull #resistance #voting against a #constitution interpreted for own ( #Madrid ) #benefit there will always be #repression.
@EU_Commission The EU is a sham, the sooner it breaks the better. We need Brexit in spain
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Referendum was suspended, not ruled yet.They could present charges against politicians but preferred to charge military police to population
@EU_Commission Double standards&hypocrisy, they allow Kosovo independence(a province of serbia) and even help bombing Kosovo and against the Catalan people
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU 2. Which of the remaining countries is going to trust any of your decisions after not supporting human rights?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU 1.Thanks to your answer not following your own rules the EU is past and about to get dissolved.
@EU_Commission Shame on you for letting this happen in front of your eyes. As a Catalan, I don't want to be part of this "Union". #CatalanReferendum
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Violence against votes is not an internal affair. #ShameEU #ShameOnSpain
@EU_Commission SHAME!!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU We have to remind you that catalans are EU citizens. #shameOnEU
@EU_Commission your silence is as harsh as one of the blows of the Spanish police. Make a meeting and we'll talk again in 6 month
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU If you know what happens in Catalonia, why do you do nothing to stop repression? Catalan people are European
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Yet it was people trying to vote and military police beating them. What about Treaty of Lisbon, article 7?
@EU_Commission Shameful position of european commission regarding violence events in Catalonia on the 1/10/2017. #EUacceptsviolence.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU This comment represents an absolute failure of the Europe of the people. So sad.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy Do you know what an oxymoron is? Rajoy and leadership can't be written in the same sentence
@EU_Commission @elentirvigo @JunckerEU Thank you. International media have seemed to forget that little detail. It was all illegal in the first place.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU UNDER INTERNATIONAL LAW YOU ARE IN BREACH OF THE UN HUMAN RIGHTS CHARTER!! SURRENDER YOUR MEMBERSHIPS IMMEDIATELY OR COMPLY!

@EU_Commission This European Union proposal is not acceptable !!
THIS IS NOT AN INTERNAL PROBLEM OF SPAIN. #CatalanReferemdum #DDHH
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Is Spanish government trampling Catalan's rights an internal matter? Aren't Catalans European citizen? Shameless! #2Oct @JunckerEU
@EU_Commission Margaritis Schinas is married to a member of the spanish party (PP) that rules Spain government
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy Shame on you!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU The EU must not tolerate the break up of a member state. Far too risky at a time when fascism is crawling back among us. #CataloniaIsSpain
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU No Sir, this is a matter of fundamental human rights, which Spain must respect or face consequences. Your response is shameful.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy He is obviously a highly incompetent politician, but apparently fully trained in Franco's methods. Shameful.
@EU_Commission Shame on you!! Where is Europe when needed?
@EU_Commission This is perfect fodder for Brexiteers about the hypocrisy of the European Commission - and, on this point I have to agree with them.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU This is a shameful position for the EU values. You're killing the EU.
@EU_Commission Resumen: Sois unos hijos de puta y apoyais unos fascistas.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy I answer only to the word of God and those who serve the message, which is to love and care for each other. Not Spain nor EU follow Gods law
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Hypocrisy of our Democracy.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU maybe it wasnt legal.... but will you make sanctions against the police brutality? isnt the EU the guardian of human rights?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Has the Constitutional Tribunal emitted a his oppinion on the referendum? Is there a law to forbid referendum in Spain?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU And is violence against peaceful people legal? Why don't you condemn it? Shame on you
@EU_Commission shame on you. When will you react to protect our civil rights?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Shame on you🤢
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Does your silence justify what happened yesterday in Catalonia? I am now an European citizen, but not willing to be any longer.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Bastards
@EU_Commission Looking at your reaction catalans should  reconsider our next candidature, we'd better stay out @jordisolef @jmterricabras
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU In my opinion, Spain and its Police must be punished for its violence yesterday. Almost 900 people injured, just because we wanted to vote!!

@EU_Commission #teamjunkerEU @MargSchinas Don’t look away!!!Send Guardia Civil out of Catalunya!!
Help to avoid riots in advance!!

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy Shame on YOU
When I was young I was proud of EU.
Now you are useless.
We won't Forget
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy You are not representing Catalan People at all!!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Aneu a cagar

@EU_Commission Shame on you! 
Catalonia is a Nation and will be a state, with or without EU.
@EU_Commission Art 2 and art 7 should be at the forefront never mind bleating about this or that  . Violence by an eu state on eu members is WRONG period.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU #catexit if Europe leaves defenseless 7.5 M citizens of Catalonia from the brutality of Spain we should think about leaving #shameoneurope
@EU_Commission If violence & civil right abuses against minorities will be tolerated on account of it being an "internal affair", the EU project is dead.
@EU_Commission #shame
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @marianorajoy You mean you trust brutality and dictatorship, I guess
@EU_Commission get your act together and condemn the brutality in Spain. Fascism on the rise judging by police violence. Unacceptable.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Shame mr @JunckerEU shame.
@Javier_ABG @EU_Commission @JunckerEU so the actions of Guardia Civil were ok ??
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Fuck you Europe
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU We don’t care about you Europe, we’re leaving. #CatalanReferendum
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Ok, that allows to police to hurt hundreds if people? Just for vote in an "iligal" referendum? #shame
@EU_Commission How about your fascist wife?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU What a gutless cowardly response.  It might take a decade, but this response is the day the EU collapsed.
@EU_Commission lost its moral authority after shameful failure to condemn Spanish Govt violence against its own people! #CatalanReferendum
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @KRLS todo en orden, siga con su golpe de estado.
@EU_Commission Scottish independence outside of EU now looking a much preferable option. Go full Norway model.
@EU_Commission europa no es pot permetre que es torni a instaurar el feixisme. O es que no aprenen de la historia!
@EU_Commission 100% Agree with Spain & EU Commission position about this. From Colombia & Venezuela. HNF Foundation.
@EU_Commission Europa ya es extraña ...
